<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Celestial Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=7525) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 277

**Prerequisites**

</column>

---

You take on a [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=551) countenance, gaining the features of a type of celestial who serves your deity; for example, as an [angel](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=359), you gain a halo and feathery wings. You gain a [fly Speed](/Rules.aspx?ID=2350) equal to your Speed. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=2410) if you don’t already have it, and you gain the celestial trait and the trait appropriate to the type of servitor you’ve become ([archon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=365), angel, or [azata](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=368), for example).
name: Celestial Form
